Text: not to complain but...the slap happy vid u posted is only half the scene...do u have the rest theres no slapping in the one u posted...need lots of slapping

"not to complain but...." The uploader also posted only half the name of this GGG-flick. "Ich bin klein" just means "I am small" and makes no sense.
The full title is "Ich bin klein, der saft ist mein" which would be "I am small, the juice is mine" (where the word "juice" is used instead of "cum", just to make the title rhyme).
There - now everyone can enjoy their depraved porn fully with an understanding of the literal meaning of the correct title.
Dont get the idea this is any kind of new release because it is not. I saw this many years ago in its entirety.
Thank you for the german lesson, mate!! Its allways wellcome. About this being a new release.. who the fuck cares? its here for anyone who doesnt know it or seen it. So enjoy it! ;)
